Class Service

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.onvifptz.Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeviceService, ImagingService, MediaService, PTZService
public abstract class Service extends Object
Default Service class for ONVIF messages. Handles building base messages, adding security headers, and sending requests
Author:
Ethan Beauclaire

      Logger method

    • getBaseDocument

      protected Document getBaseDocument()
      Get the base document that all other services add to; creates the header and body, and adds relevant namespace attributes.

    • addSecurityHeaderDocument

      protected Document addSecurityHeaderDocument(Document doc) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Add the security headers to the document, using WS-Security specification
      Parameters:
      doc - the document for which to add headers
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      UnsupportedEncodingException

    • sendRequestDocument

      public String sendRequestDocument(Document doc) throws IOException
      Sends an XML message to the handler URL, specified in the service fields; adds authentication headers if specified.
      Parameters:
      doc - the XML DOM Document to send
      Returns:
      the response from the device, as a String
      Throws:
      IOException
